resume.name: Pacy
resume.summary: Supported myself through freelance work while studying at Kobe University. Later interned as a Ruby-focused full stack engineer at Donuts Bangkok branch. Joined Fringe81 Co., Ltd. as a new graduate engineer in 2019. Maintained and developed the frontend of an HRTech business using the pure functional language Elm. Moved to the advertising business in 2020, where I was responsible for the log aggregation infrastructure of an advertising delivery system, maintaining and developing the server-side/infrastructure with Scala. Joined CryptoGames.inc as a full stack engineer in June 2021, became the NFT business development lead in November of the same year, and was appointed CTO of the company in July 2022. Currently working on frontend development with Nuxt.js/Next.js, server-side development with TypeScript/Go/Python, and smart contract development with Solidity.
